http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif LRG List LRG List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=LRG&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=LRG.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-01-14T12:37:35Z Howe, Michael P.A. 2015-01-14T12:36:53+00:00 2015-01-14T12:36:53+00:00 Shropshire Museum Resource Centre https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;186747a0.1501 Dear LRG supporter,<br><br>I guess many of you will already be aware that Shropshire Council is proposing to reduce expenditure on their County Museum Resource Centre situated in Ludlow and make three staff, including their only geologist, redundant. The following email and attachments explain the situation in more detail.<br><br>There is a strong feeling that the research community needs to stress to the Council the international scientific importance of the material that they are guarding, and I am very grateful that Peter Warren has offered to draft a message to the Council expressing the concerns of the international science community. [...] Howe, Michael P.A. 2014-10-30T17:28:11+00:00 2014-10-30T17:28:11+00:00 LRG / BIGG speaker meeting at Keyworth - Saturday 15th November https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;1bf63827.1410 Dear Members of the Ludlow Research Group and the British & Irish Graptolite Group,<br><br>I am pleased to distribute the draft programme for the forthcoming meeting at BGS Keyworth on Saturday 15th November. We have had a number of good talks offered, but little interest in the core workshop, so we will restrict ourselves to the talks, business meetings, lunch, tea & coffee, and socialising. There is space for additional talks and participants. [...] Howe, Michael P.A. 2014-10-02T17:30:18+01:00 2014-10-02T17:30:18+01:00 LRG / BIGG speaker meeting at Keyworth + "Virtual Field Trip" in the Core Store - Saturday 15th November https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;25a053e1.1410 Dear Members of the Ludlow Research Group and the British & Irish Graptolite Group,<br><br>The returns are in and Saturday 15th November wins by 1 vote. Currently we are looking at about a dozen participants, so please spread the word and see if you can encourage a few more to attend. Likewise, we have 5 talks at the moment, but we certainly have space for a few more.... [...] Howe, Michael P.A. 2014-08-29T17:53:35+01:00 2014-08-29T17:53:35+01:00 Proposed LRG / BIGG speaker meeting at Keyworth + "Virtual Field Trip" in the Core Store https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;61d33ee0.1408 Dear Members of the Ludlow Research Group and the British & Irish Graptolite Group,<br><br>I'm afraid it has not proved possible to organise the intended LRG meeting on Anglesey this autumn, due largely to access problems with many of the key localities. However, we have at least one firm offer for next year (Ludlow graptolites of the Long Mountain), plus possible alternatives. [...]
